com.compendium.ui.menus
Class UIMenuView

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.menus.UIMenuView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICoreConstants, IUIConstants, IUIMenu, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
public class UIMenuView
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUIMenu, java.awt.event.ActionListener, IUIConstants, ICoreConstants

This class creates and manages the View menu.
